prompt: On the left, two primitive $b$-cycles (accepting states are denoted by double circles) whose associated words are $0011$ (top) and $001$ (bottom), starting at $0$ and $\alpha$, respectively. On the right, the $b$-cycle of $\{0,\alpha\}$ of associated word $0011\odot 001 = 001101111011$, which is primitive by Lemma~\ref{lm:primitive product}.
